item.title: Postfix + Dkim
item.description: Recently I decided to give another try installing and maintaining my own mail server. Installing Postfix and Dovecot wasn’t a huge issue although I did struggled a bit with SASL but oh well, works fine now. After being able to receive and send emails, I decided to move on and install the additional services, DKIM being the first. Configuring DKIM is not hard especially if it’s a simple use case as mine.
